name: Oh, spaceships!
description:
Hello, and welcome to "Oh, spaceships!", a game made for my little brothers birthday. It's a little late, but I hope you enjoy it. space-bar to shoot, and left-right arrow keys to move. when you have chosen your ship, press space to start.

art came from https://www.pinterest.com/pin/299419075206876013/.

music credit
Epic Boss Battle by Juhani Junkala | https://soundcloud.com/juhanijunkala
